name: odoo-helpdesk-mcp
description: MCP Server exposing Odoo Helpdesk chatter tools (read/search/post) via HTTP for LLM agents.

tools.name: get_ticket_chatter
tools.description: Return chatter messages for a given helpdesk.ticket

tools.name: search_chatter
tools.description: Search chatter messages for a given ticket using a text query (ILIKE).

tools.name: post_message
tools.description: Post a message to the chatter of a helpdesk.ticket.
